name: Cobble Monkey
description:
The Gorilla King has monopolized all the bananas in the kingdom. He has hidden the biggest banana in a cobblestone cave where he thinks no one will ever find it.

Little does he know, a small monkey has discovered the cave in search of the giant banana. It's up to this little monkey to get past the Gorilla King and take the banana!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

SHIFT to move faster

MOUSE to move camera

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by:

Shay Czachowski
